General.Name: Pritish Nandy Communications Limited
General.Description: Pritish Nandy Communications Ltd, a media and entertainment company, engages in the production and exploitation of content in India. The company produces cinematographic films, TV serials, digital series, etc. It is also involved in the wellness business, as well as owns Moksh, Power Yoga, Passion Yoga, Cool Yoga, and Couple Yoga brands. Pritish Nandy Communications Ltd was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Mumbai, India.
